t: Second Amazon Style location in the country opens at Easton Town Center in Columbus
s: October 18, 2022 - The store occupies the 28,000-square-foot former home of Forever 21, at 3985 Gramercy St., in the Easton Station building. Amazon Style features hundreds of brands and thousands of styles and makes use of advanced technology to create an unconventional shopping experience, boasts the company.
